arts.ttl: Sheff Utd move level with leaders Leeds after beating Preston

arts.ttl: “Situation is personal” – Claim manager overlooking Sheffield United player for being ‘sensitive’
arts.sum: Sheffield United’s Ben Brereton Díaz should have been called up by Chile manager Ricardo Gareca for the upcoming international break. That’s according to journalist Juan Cristóbal Guarello, and he told this to La Hora de King Kong, relayed by Redgol.
